name: Glorious GMMK 3
description: Modular full-size keyboard with pre-lubed GOAT stabilizers and hot-swap support. Features per-key RGB, USB-C, and compatibility with most MX-style switches.

reviews.review_text: Full-size with numpad. Finally a premium option.
GOAT stabs really live up to the name.
Software is better but still needs work.
